H0.text: According to Arthurian legend, Arthur's wife Guinevere, had a little on the side with which Knight of the Round Table. Lancelot

H1.text: According to Arthurian legend, Arthur's wife Guinevere, had a little on the side with which Knight of the Round Table. Gawain

H2.text: According to Arthurian legend, Arthur's wife Guinevere, had a little on the side with which Knight of the Round Table. Percival

H3.text: According to Arthurian legend, Arthur's wife Guinevere, had a little on the side with which Knight of the Round Table. Evaine

A4.text: the two then begin an escalating romantic affair that will go on for many years and in the end will inadvertently lead to Arthur's fall.
